fullText: The revival of 'Side Show' is a sumptuous production that showcases the considerable talents of Erin Davie and Emily Padgett as conjoined twins Daisy and Violet Hilton, but the musical itself remains a problematic work.
dtliExcerpt: The revival of 'Side Show' is a sumptuous production that showcases the considerable talents of Erin Davie and Emily Padgett as conjoined twins Daisy and Violet Hilton, but the musical itself remains a problematic work.
bwwExcerpt: But so much of 'Side Show' goes so right, you don't mind that it still seems to be wrestling with itself, just a bit. Because you'll struggle a bit, too, as you sort out what you and the rest of the world make and made of Violet and Daisy.
